mapper.select: SELECT r.id AS reservationId, r.fairytale_id AS fairyTaleId, f.title AS fairyTaleTitle, TO_CHAR(r.reservation_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reservationDate, f.image AS fairyTaleImage FROM RESERVATIONS r JOIN FAIRYTALES f ON r.fairytale_id = f.id WHERE profile_id = #{profileId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATIONS (PROFILE_ID, FAIRYTALE_ID, RESERVATION_DATE) VALUES (#{profileId}, #{fairytaleId}, #{selectedDate})
